title: Time for Filing New York State Income Tax Returns
content:
Time for Filing New York State Income Tax Returns

State Regulations
§ 152.1 - Time for filing New York State income tax returns
§ 152.2 - Due date
§ 152.3 - Last day on Saturday, Sunday or legal holiday
§ 152.4 - Timely mailing treated as timely filing
§ 152.5 - Filing of New York State income tax return before due date
§ 152.6 - New York State personal income tax returns of military personnel
§ 152.7 - New York State income tax return for decedent
§ 152.8 - New York State income tax returns for periods of less than 12 months
§ 152.9 - Change of accounting period
§ 152.10 - Change of resident status
§ 152.11 - Nonresident aliens

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
